CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `wp_fixalttext_images` (`id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`from_post_id` bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT "0",`from_post_type` varchar(20) NOT NULL,`from_where` varchar(20) NOT NULL,`from_where_key` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`image_index` smallint NULL,`image_url` text NULL DEFAULT "",`image_alt_text` text NULL,`image_ext` varchar(20) NULL,`image_issues` varchar(100) NULL,PRIMARY KEY `id`(`id`),KEY `from_post_id`(`from_post_id`),KEY `from_post_type`(`from_post_type`),KEY `from_where`(`from_where`),KEY `image_ext`(`image_ext`),KEY `image_issues`(`image_issues`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
